faqs.question: What is C R A Y?
faqs.answer: C R A Y is a Saudi-based platform that connects creators — artists, influencers, educators, designers, and more — with their fans and supporters. Creators can share exclusive content, memberships, and experiences, while supporters can back their favorite creators directly and enjoy private perks.

faqs.question: How is C R A Y different from Patreon?
faqs.answer: C R A Y is built with local values, languages, and payment systems in mind. Unlike global platforms, we focus on Arab creators and audiences, support Saudi and GCC payment gateways, and ensure compliance with local regulations (PDPL, SDAIA). It's creativity, made local.

faqs.question: Who can join C R A Y?
faqs.answer: Anyone can join — whether you're a creator or a supporter. Creators can come from any field (art, design, education, tech, lifestyle) and users can subscribe to or support as many creators as they want.

faqs.question: How do creators earn money on C R A Y?
faqs.answer: Creators earn through: Memberships or subscriptions (monthly or yearly), Exclusive paid content (videos, images, lessons, etc.), Tips or one-time support from fans, Brand collaborations and partnerships (coming soon). Earnings are securely transferred to the creator's chosen account through Saudi-approved payment partners.

faqs.question: Is C R A Y available worldwide?
faqs.answer: C R A Y is based in Saudi Arabia, but open to creators and users worldwide. Our platform supports both Arabic and English, and accepts international payments.

faqs.question: How do I become a creator?
faqs.answer: Simply click "Become a Creator" on our homepage, create an account, and set up your profile. You'll be able to upload content, set membership levels, and start earning once verified.

faqs.question: How does C R A Y protect my data?
faqs.answer: We follow the Saudi Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) and international privacy standards. Your data is encrypted, never sold, and only used to operate your account safely. You can read our full Privacy Policy for details.

faqs.question: What kind of content is allowed?
faqs.answer: C R A Y supports creative, educational and entertaining content that aligns with Saudi and international content laws. We do not allow content that violates local culture, religious sensitivities, or copyright.

faqs.question: Can I use C R A Y for business or brand partnerships?
faqs.answer: Yes! Brands and companies can collaborate with creators through sponsorships and campaigns. If you're a brand interested in partnerships, contact us at partners@cray.com

faqs.question: How can I contact C R A Y?
faqs.answer: For general questions: support@cray.com, For privacy matters: privacy@cray.com, For business partnerships: partners@cray.com, For media inquiries: media@cray.com

faqs.question: What languages does C R A Y support?
faqs.answer: C R A Y is fully available in Arabic and English, with more regional languages planned soon.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes — the C R A Y mobile app (iOS and Android) is in development and will be released soon. Until then, you can access the full platform through any browser on mobile or desktop.

faqs.question: How does C R A Y handle refunds or payment issues?
faqs.answer: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis through our support team. If you experience a payment issue, email billing@cray.com, and our team will resolve it within 3–5 business days.

faqs.question: Why is it called "C R A Y"?
faqs.answer: The name "Kray" is inspired by the word "Crazy," as the platform celebrates the vibrant energy and beautiful madness that connect artists with their fans. It creates an interactive space that reflects genuine passion and freedom of expression, encouraging authentic connection and spontaneous engagement away from formality.

privacy.title: Protecting your learning journey
privacy.subtitle: We design every C R A Y experience with privacy in mind—from the courses you browse to the certifications you earn. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information, and the controls you have along the way.

highlights.title: Crystal-clear transparency
highlights.description: We explain which data we collect, why we collect it, and how long we retain it in language that is easy to understand.

highlights.title: Security-first mindset
highlights.description: Your personal information is encrypted in transit and at rest, safeguarded by continuous monitoring and dedicated security reviews.

highlights.title: You control your data
highlights.description: Download, update, or delete your information whenever you need. We provide self-serve tools and responsive support to help.

infoCollect.title: Information we collect
paragraphs: We collect the information you share with us when creating an account, enrolling in a course, or interacting with C R A Y content. This may include your name, email address, payment details, demographic information, and any preferences you choose to store in your profile.

We also gather limited technical data such as browser type, device identifiers, and usage analytics to help us maintain platform reliability and improve the learning experience. We never collect more than we need, and we never sell your personal data.

howWeUse.title: How we use your information
paragraphs: Your information powers key C R A Y features like course recommendations, progress tracking, certification, and customer support. We use aggregated insights to improve course quality, detect fraud, and keep the platform safe for learners and instructors alike.

When we communicate with you, it is to deliver service updates, account notifications, or personalized learning tips. You can adjust your communication preferences or unsubscribe from marketing email at any time.

sharing.title: Sharing & third parties
paragraphs: We share information with trusted service providers who help us operate the platform—such as payment processors, analytics partners, and cloud hosting vendors. These partners are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and cannot use your data for their own purposes.
If the law requires it, we may disclose limited information in response to valid legal requests. Otherwise, we never disclose personal data unless you provide explicit consent.

dataRetention.title: Data retention & deletion
paragraphs: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide Services. When data is no longer required, we erase or anonymize it. You may request deletion at any time by contacting support—once confirmed, we remove or de-identify your personal data within 30 days.
Some information may persist in encrypted backups for a limited period before being completely removed.

international.title: International transfers
paragraphs: C R A Y may process data on servers located in different countries. Whenever information crosses borders, we apply the same rigorous safeguards and rely on industry-standard legal mechanisms such as Standard Contractual Clauses to protect your privacy.

yourRights.title: Your rights & choices
paragraphs: You can access, correct, download, or delete your personal information directly from your account dashboard. You also have the right to object to processing, withdraw consent, and file a complaint with your local data protection authority.
To exercise any of these rights or ask a question, contact us at privacy@C R A Y.com. We respond within one business day.

ctaBox.title: Need a data export or deletion?
ctaBox.description: Use the account dashboard to download your learning history and certificates. Prefer a guided request? Our privacy team will help you gather, update, or remove your data within 24 hours.

quickAccess.title: Quick access
items: Download your account data from the dashboard settings.
Update email preferences directly from any C R A Y email footer.
Reach out to support for enterprise privacy agreements or data processing addendums.
